## Data acquistion
```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(riem)
library(sf)
library(leaflet)
library(mapview)

```
```{r}
network <- riem_networks()
network

co_riem <- riem_stations("CO_ASOS")

co_spatial <- st_as_sf(co_riem, coords = c("lon", "lat"), crs = 4326)

plot(co_spatial)

```

```{r}
m <- leaflet(co_spatial) %>%
  addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  addCircleMarkers()
m  # Print the map



```


```{r}
mapview(co_spatial)


```
